body: I have been making skybases on the walls next to the corners and other people from the other section just shoot you down. I am not sure if this is allowed or not but is it?
body_tagged: I have been making skybases on the walls next to the corners and other people from the other section just shoot you down. I am not sure if this is allowed or not but is it?
title: Killing people before walls fall?

replies.body: Its a glitch in the game, I kinda like it, get the op bow is now a little difficult
replies.body_tagged: Its a glitch in the game, I kinda like it, get the op bow is now a little difficult
